item.title: CLI Commands in Emacs
item.description: A few months ago, Gabriel Gonzalez wrote an excellent article on creating useful tools with Haskell. He used an example of a small CLI tool that aligns the equals signs of a multi-line text input. The article wrapped up by integrating this tool into vim. I love the overarching concept in the article: create small tools that are useful in multiple contexts. It's directly inline with the Unix philosophy.
